abstract: China is considering a plan to set up a regional bank to help smaller companies invest in Southeast Asia, finance infrastructure projects and promote development in southwestern China, Reuters reports.
snippet: China is considering a plan to set up a regional bank to help smaller companies invest in Southeast Asia, finance infrastructure projects and promote development in southwestern China, Reuters reports.
lead_paragraph: China is considering a plan to set up a regional bank to help smaller companies invest in Southeast Asia, finance infrastructure projects and promote development in southwestern China, Reuters reports. Read more »

headline.main: China Considers Bank for Southeast Asia Investors
